site_name: Former Linpac Corrugated Cases Ltd AndLand Adjacent To Railway LineCollins WayErithBexley
description: Details of conditions 3(materials and finishes), 4(biodiversity), 5(contaminated land assessment), 6(Construction Environmental Management plan), 7(Sustainability Statement), 8(access roads), 9(Landscape and Ecological Management Plan), 10(drainage scheme), 11(bird/bat boxes), 12(reptile enhancement), 13(translocation methodology), 14(vehicle parking), 15(screen walls and fences) and 20(landscaping) pursuant to planning permission 18/03292/FUL for the erection of three storey block providing 6 x 2 bed-self contained apartments with associated parking provision, storage for cycles, refuse and recycling and amenity space.
